title: MUC issues
comment: Generally works well, but if you lose connection to a server the MUCs don't reconnect and you have to join the room again from scratch. Use a bookmark to speed up the process a little.

title: Average
comment: Its a functional app. Does all the basic stuff. But the interface is very boring and very similar to the gTalk app. Needs improvement.

title: Three big bugs.
comment: - No way to delete account other than uninstalling the app - The client doesn't reconnect if you change type of connection (3g/WiFi) - Persistente notification like 2.3 apps.

title: Not good
comment: I tryed to open page but its not gave any responce
